props.title: Total messages
props.query: SELECT average(`rabbitmq.queue.totalMessages`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Published messages
props.query: SELECT average(`rabbitmq.queue.messagesPublished`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Published messages throughput
props.query: SELECT average(`rabbitmq.rabbitmq.queue.messagesPublishedPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Total messages throughput
props.query: SELECT average(`rabbitmq.rabbitmq.queue.totalMessagesPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Consumer messages
props.query: SELECT average(`rabbitmq.queue.consumerMessageUtilizationPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Bytes consumed
props.query: SELECT average(`rabbitmq.queue.erlangBytesConsumedInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Consumers
props.query: SELECT average(`rabbitmq.queue.consumers`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
